header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Full-stack engineer with 6+ years building production blockchain platforms and mission-critical distributed systems. Proven startup experience developing institutional-grade blockchain infrastructure at an early-stage company, combined with enterprise-scale expertise building event-driven architectures serving millions of users. Strong TypeScript foundation spanning modern web applications with a deep knowledge of blockchain-compatible systems and on-chain financial applications.

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer
experience.detail: Architected and built core blockchain platform infrastructure for an early-stage startup developing proof-of-stake consensus algorithms and a distributed node runtime using Scala functional programming with Akka actors for high-throughput transaction processing

Designed mission-critical peer-to-peer networking protocols using TCP channels enabling thousands of transactions per second across a distributed node network, ensuring fault tolerance and Byzantine resistance
Built comprehensive HTTP management APIs for node operations including transaction signing, staking key management, wallet integration, and blockchain state queries

Developed a high-performance transaction indexing and streaming client using functional programming patterns (Cats Effect, http4s) with MongoDB for queryable blockchain state, enabling real-time analytics and chain monitoring
Created React-based user interfaces including a Chrome extension for wallet management and a transaction monitoring dashboard, providing non-technical users access to complex blockchain operations

Collaborated directly with founders and cross-functional teams to define technical architecture, establish engineering practices, and ship production features rapidly in a fast-paced startup environment

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: Architected a streaming data platform serving 50+ teams across Disney+ and Hulu, processing millions of real-time events through AWS infrastructure with sub-second latency requirements and 99.99% uptime SLA
Built a schema registry system using AWS Smithy schemas with automated code generation for Scala, Java, and Python, enabling type-safe event contracts across microservices
Designed sophisticated CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions automating schema validation, compatibility checks, artifact publishing, and deployment orchestration with zero-downtime releases

Developed a state management system integrated with the content metadata catalog supporting millions of concurrent users, maintaining derived state from event streams with exactly-once processing semantics
Implemented data lineage tracking using the OpenLineage standard, building Java agents for runtime instrumentation and metadata extraction enabling end-to-end data pipeline observability
Established engineering standards and documentation practices using Docusaurus, creating comprehensive API guides and integration examples for internal developer platform adoption

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II
experience.detail: Developed full-stack features for the enterprise construction management platform using TypeScript Angular frontend with RxJS reactive patterns and C# ASP.NET backend microservices on Azure

Architected an event-sourced change order system with immutable audit trails and complex entity referencing, processing thousands of daily transactions with strict consistency guarantees and aggregates defined with JavaScript
Built real-time synchronization infrastructure using Kafka streams connecting web application to enterprise resource management system, ensuring data consistency across distributed services
Collaborated in an agile environment using Git and Azure DevOps for sprint planning, code reviews, and continuous deployment pipelines

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
experience.detail: Designed a test automation framework enabling non-technical team members to define test scenarios using simple C# interfaces, improving QA team velocity by 90%
Built an API testing framework for microservices validation and Selenium-based UI testing infrastructure with headless browser support
Executed performance testing using JMeter and Locust simulating thousands of concurrent users, identifying and resolving scalability bottlenecks before production deployment
